sourcesContent:
import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { clearCart, deleteItem, incrementCount, decrementCount } from "../../../state/cart-reducer"; const Cart = (props) => { const { items, totalPrice, countItem } = useSelector(state => state.cart); const dispatch = useDispatch(); const onClearCart = () => { dispatch(clearCart()) }; const onDeleteItem = (index, price) => { let obj = {index, price} dispatch(deleteItem(obj)); } const onIncrementCount = (price) => { dispatch(incrementCount(price)) }; const onDecrementCount = (price) => { dispatch(decrementCount(price)) }; return (

Корзина

Очистить корзину
{items.map((item,i) => { return (

{item.name}

{item.type} тесто, {item.size} см.

onDecrementCount(item.price)} className="button button--outline button--circle cart__item-count-minus">
{countItem}
onIncrementCount(item.price)} className="button button--outline button--circle cart__item-count-plus">
{item.price * countItem} ₽
onDeleteItem(i, item.price)} className="button button--outline button--circle">
)})}
Всего пицц: {items.length} шт. Сумма заказа: {totalPrice} ₽
Вернуться назад
Оплатить сейчас
) }; export default Cart;
